A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Full of twists and spins takes a whole new approach to Star Wars. Some people say it’s too different but I am really into it. Last movie people said it was too much like ANH and now they’re complaining it’s not enough like ESB. I love how it’s fresh and new the past was killed to move towards the future and I am fully on board with it. The movie is suspenseful\, shocking\, dark\, and yet so funny I think Rian Johnson did an incredible job and I can’t wait to see what he does with episode IX. (Also the acting is phenomenal I would recommend watching it just for Adam Driver’s performance)
